biog.entry.name: GRAY, the Hon. Gary, AO
biog.entry.description: Biography for GRAY, the Hon. Gary, AO
biog.entry.electorate.name: Member for Brand (WA)
biog.entry.title: Biography for GRAY, the Hon. Gary, AO
biog.entry.electorate.state.name: Member for Brand (WA)
biog.entry.party.name: Australian Labor Party

parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Brand, Western Australia, 2007 and 2010.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Parliamentary Secretary for Regional Development and Northern Australia from 3.12.07 to 9.6.09.
Parliamentary Secretary for Western and Northern Australia from 9.6.09 to 14.9.10.
Special Minister of State from 14.9.10 to 25.3.13.
Special Minister of State for the Public Service and Integrity from 14.9.10 to 14.12.11.
Minister for the Public Service and Integrity from 14.12.11 to 25.3.13.
Minister for Resources and Energy from 25.3.13 to 18.9.13.
Minister for Small Business from 25.3.13 to 18.9.13.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Member, Opposition Shadow Ministry from 14.10.13. Shadow Minister for Resources from 18.10.13; Shadow Minister for Northern Australia from 18.10.13; Shadow Special Minister of State from 18.10.13.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Assistant National Secretary and Director of Fundraising, ALP 1990.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament

honours.title: Honours
honours.para: Appointed Officer of the Order of Australia, January 2003.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: south of Perth; it includes the centres of Kwinana and Rockingham, and parts of Mandurah.
Industries: heavy industry in the Kwinana industrial area, alumina refining, tourism and the naval base HMAS Stirling on Garden Island.
State electorates: Brand includes the Western Australian Legislative Assembly electorates of Kwinana, Rockingham, Warnbro and parts of Mandurah.
